problem_text:
Let x be a right 4-Engel element of a group G.
a) Is it true that the normal closure ⟨x⟩G of x in G is nilpotent if G is locally nilpotent?
b) If the answer to a) is affirmative, is there a bound on the nilpotency class of ⟨x⟩G?
c) Is it true that ⟨x⟩G is always nilpotent?
A. Abdollahi
